docs.title: MA2221 – Foundational Mathematics for Machine Learning
docs.text:
Instructor: Biswarup Biswas Mahindra University

Class Timings: - Lecture: Tue 9:25–10:20, Wed 10:35–11:30, Thu 2:35–3:30 (Room: ELT6) - Lab: Monday 3:35–5:30 (Computer Lab 3)

docs.title: Lectures
docs.text: No Date Topic Slides 1 20-01-2026 Introduction to Machine Learning and Models 2 21-01-2026 Scalars, Vectors, and Matrices

docs.title: Module 1 — Introduction
docs.text: Class 1 - What is Machine Learning - Data, models, training, prediction - Why mathematics is needed

docs.title: Module 2 — Linear Algebra
docs.text: Class 2 – Scalars, vectors, matrices, notation Class 3 – Linear systems and matrix operations Class 4 – Matrix inverse and rank Class 5 – Vector spaces and subspaces Class 6 – Linear independence, basis, dimension Class 7 – Column space and null space Class 8 – Linear maps and geometric interpretation

docs.title: Module 3 — Analytic Geometry
docs.text: Class 9 – Norms and distances Class 10 – Inner products and angles Class 11 – Orthogonality and orthonormal bases Class 12 – Projections and least squares Class 13 – Geometry of data

docs.title: Module 4 — Matrix Decompositions (Chapter 4)
docs.text: Class 14 – Determinant and trace Class 15 – Eigenvalues and eigenvectors Class 16 – Diagonalization and spectral theorem Class 17 – Singular Value Decomposition (SVD) Class 18 – SVD for data representation

docs.title: Module 5 — Vector Calculus
docs.text: Class 19 – Multivariate functions Class 20 – Gradients and partial derivatives Class 21 – Jacobian, Hessian, Taylor expansion Class 22 – Gradient-based optimization

docs.title: Module 6 — Probability
docs.text: Class 23 – Random variables and distributions Class 24 – Expectation, variance, covariance Class 25 – Multivariate Gaussian distribution Class 26 – Probability and data modeling

docs.title: Module 7 — When Models Meet Data
docs.text: Class 27 – Training vs testing and generalization Class 28 – Loss functions and empirical risk Class 29 – Overfitting, bias–variance, regularization

docs.title: Module 8 — Linear Regression
docs.text: Class 30 – Linear regression model Class 31 – Least-squares solution Class 32 – Regularized regression

docs.title: Module 9 — Principal Component Analysis
docs.text: Class 33 – Dimensionality reduction and covariance Class 34 – Eigenvectors and principal components Class 35 – PCA using SVD Class 36 – PCA for compression and visualization

docs.title: Module 10 — Gaussian Mixture Models
docs.text: Class 37 – Density estimation and mixture models Class 38 – Gaussian Mixture Models Class 39 – Expectation–Maximization (EM) algorithm

docs.title: Textbook
docs.text: Deisenroth, M. P., Faisal, A. A., & Ong, C. S. (2020). Mathematics for Machine Learning. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press.
